page.title: 14BROWNIES AND CUBS IN WALES
page.content: {BROWNIES}- Brownies are group of girls who meet weekly. On the first night the leader will put you in a particular 'six' or group. Our six names are Gnomes, Imps, Elves, Pixies, and Sprites. We play games and do handicrafts and bookwork. The brownie uniform is a brown dress and a yellow tie. You can start brownies at seven years of age and you leave at ten, when you can join the guides if you wish. {CUBS}- Cubs are a group of boys who meet weekly at the scout hut.You start cubs at the age of eight and leave at ten and a half.The cub uniform is a green jumper and grey shorts with a red and green neckachief.The cub motto is "Be prepared". Like in the Brownies, Cubs do tasks so as to achieve different badges which are sewn onto their uniforms.
